mapper.insert: insert into t_dish (dishID, dishTypeID, dishName, dishSpeel, dishCost, dishUnit, dishPrice, dishDescription, dishCooking, dishImgUrl, delFlag, lastSubTime, subBy) values (#{dishid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{dishtypeid,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{dishname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dishspeel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dishcost,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{dishunit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dishprice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{dishdescription,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dishcooking,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dishimgurl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{delflag,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{lastsubtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{subby,jdbcType=INTEGER})
